6214.verse-arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
6214.verse-english: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,

clauses-arabic.clause: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ

clauses-english.clause: When the victory of God has come and the conquest,

6215.verse-arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
6215.verse-english: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,

clauses-arabic.clause: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا

clauses-english.clause: And you see the people entering into the religion of God in multitudes,

6216.verse-arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
6216.verse-english: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

clauses-english.clause: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him.
He is ever Accepting of repentance.
